description.value:
Your debilitations are especially effective on your most powerful attacks. Whenever you critically succeed at an attack roll against an enemy and use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Debilitating Strike], add the following debilitation to the list you can choose from.

Debilitation The target attempts a Fortitude save against your class DC with the following effects.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 1} until the end of your next turn.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed]{Slowed 2} until the end of your next turn.

Critical Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed] until the end of your next turn.
